sentences.pinyin: Tā shì gè tǐng zhí de rén.

sentences.simplifiedText: 老师认为他是个挺直的人, 他总是直言不讳, 不会说假话。
sentences.traditionalText: 老師認為他是個挺直的人, 他總是直言不諱, 不會說假話。
sentences.pinyin: Lǎoshī rènwéi tā shì gè tǐng zhí de rén, tā zǒng shì zhíyánbùhuì, bù huì shuō jiǎhuà.
sentences.translation: The teacher thinks he is a straight person, he always speaks frankly and doesn't tell lies.

definitions.meaning: to stick out (a part of the body)

sentences.simplifiedText: 他挺出胸来，显示出他的自豪。
sentences.traditionalText: 他挺出胸來，顯示出他的自豪。
sentences.pinyin: Tā tǐng chū xiōng lái, xiǎnshì chū tā de zìháo.
sentences.translation: He sticks out his chest, showing his pride.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在那紧张的情况下，他挺出胸来保护你，这表明他是一个真正的勇士。
sentences.traditionalText: 在那緊張的情況下，他挺出胸來保護你，這表明他是一個真正的勇士。
sentences.pinyin: Zài nà jǐnzhāng de qíngkuàng xià, tā tǐng chū xiōng lái bǎohù nǐ, zhè biǎomíng tā shì yīgè zhēnzhèng de yǒngshì.
sentences.translation: In that tense situation, he stuck out his chest to protect you, proving he's a true warrior.

sentences.simplifiedText: 无论你决定做什么，我都会挺你到底。
sentences.traditionalText: 無論你決定做什麼，我都會挺你到底。
sentences.pinyin: wú lùn nǐ jué dìng zuò shén me, wǒ dū huì tǐng nǐ dào dǐ.
sentences.translation: No matter what you decide to do, I will support you to the end.

sentences.simplifiedText: 面对强大的压力，她挺住了并展现了挺的精神。
sentences.traditionalText: 面對強大的壓力，她挺住了並展現了挺的精神。
sentences.pinyin: Miàn duì qiángdà de yālì, tā tǐng zhùle bìng zhǎnxiànle tǐng de jīngshén.
sentences.translation: Facing the immense pressure, she held up and demonstrated an outstanding spirit.

sentences.simplifiedText: 对于他的新歌我挺满意的，因为他的歌词真的很有深意。
sentences.traditionalText: 對於他的新歌我挺滿意的，因為他的歌詞真的很有深意。
sentences.pinyin: Duìyú tā de xīn gē wǒ tǐng mǎnyì de, yīnwèi tā de gēcí zhēn de hěn yǒu shēnyì.
sentences.translation: I'm quite satisfied with his new song, because his lyrics are really profound.
